entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Dryden
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:15 AM CDT Tuesday 21 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Sunny, -5.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Dryden Airport 12:00 PM CDT Tuesday 21 March 2023
Condition: Sunny
Temperature: -5.6°C
Pressure: 102.7 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 43 %
Wind Chill: -11
Dewpoint: -16.3°C
Wind: NE 15 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 20 this morning and minus 10 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CDT Tuesday 21 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Snow beginning late this evening. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CDT Tuesday 21 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. High zero.
